PRIMARY OBJECTIVE We aim : 1 . Characterize tryptase level dynamic TAVR 2 . Demonstrate whether tryptase level post-TAVR use prognostic marker . Primary outcome - mortality 1 year Secondary outcomes - Major complication 7 day 30 day , include death , major stroke , acute kidney injury , paravalvular regurgitation , permanent pacemaker implantation , coronary artery obstruction , heart block , vascular injury , pericardial hemorrhage .
